question:
Consider the following statements about the GARV Portal launched by the government:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Power
  2. It monitors the real time power supply in rural villages
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
GARV Portal is an initiative under the Ministry of Power. It aims to monitor the rural electrification in about 600,000 villages in real time under the Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Gram Jyoti Yojna (DDUGJY).
